place to do anything related to physics
the reason for this is that your frame
rate can constantly change which makes
physics fairly unreliable instead it's
recommended that we use something called
fixed update let's go ahead and create
that function right here let go void

in the exact same way that update does
it's also called a bunch of times per

timer and not stuck to the frame rate
like update is by default fixed update
will be called 50 times a second so this
is much more reliable when working with
